casebody.data:
Pat A. SCARTH, Petitioner-Appellant, v. Colonel Albert J. GERACI et al., Respondents-Appellees. No. 74-3666

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 3, 1975. John T. Montford, Lubbock, Tex., for petitioner-appellant. Frank D. McCown, U. S. Atty., Fort Worth, Tex., Robert B. Wilson, Asst. U. S. Atty., Lubbock, Tex., for respondentsappellees. Before BROWN, Chief Judge, and GODBOLD and GEE, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir., See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

The opinion of the District Court reported at 382 F.Supp. 876 (1974), is correct. It is

Affirmed.
